trans-unit.source: Converts objects to and from a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> class.

Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert an object of the specified type to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>, using the specified context.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>: - <xref:System.String> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Single> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int16> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.Int64> - <xref:System.UInt16> - <xref:System.UInt32> - <xref:System.UInt64>
An object that provides a format context.
The type to convert from.

true if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert the specified type to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>; otherwise, false.

Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref> to the specified type.
The CanConvertTo method returns `true` if `destinationType` is <xref:System.String> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.
Otherwise, CanConvertTo returns `false`.
An object that provides a format context.
The type to convert to.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref> to the specified type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Converts the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>: - <xref:System.String> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Single> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int16> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.Int64> - <xref:System.UInt16> - <xref:System.UInt32> - <xref:System.UInt64> Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method before calling the ConvertFrom to avoid throwing an exception.
An object that provides a format context.
An object that provides the culture information that is used during conversion.
The object to convert to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>.
The converted object.
source is .
--or-- source cannot be converted to a .
Converts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref> to an object of the specified type.

Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to avoid throwing an exception.
An object that provides a format context.
An object that provides the culture information that is used during conversion.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref> to convert to another type.
The type to convert to.
The converted object.
destinationType is null.
value is .
--or-- value is not a .
